nodes.text: Neekoflights were an avian species native to rainforests on Neimoidia. These humorous cage birds were known for their unique beeping squawk. They also had a membranous display crest that opened up when the bird squawked.
Neekoflights appeared in the non-canon Star Wars: Tiny Death Star, where in-game Neimoidians prepared a pie from their meat.
